channel.title: Webclient Slow and Doesnt work?
channel.description:
Whenever trying to play my Webclient.. It is overly slow.. And then gives you a White Screen.. How could I fix this? Link to Webclient: [url=http://www.dreamscapelandrsps.webs.com/client.html]www.dreamscapelandrsps.webs.com/client.html[/url]
UPDATE: The client.jar file is 73,000KB, When it should be mroe around 600KB... Lol.. That's most likely the problem.. But how could I make my Jar file MUCH smaller?

item.title: Webclient Slow and Doesnt work?
item.dc:creator: @qtst35 qtst35
item.description:
@qtst35 wrote:

o problem at all m8. glad to help

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient Slow and Doesnt work?
item.dc:creator: @Trade_Me Trade Me
item.description:
@Trade_Me wrote:

[quote=“qtst35, post:2, topic:444638”]your supposed to have you cache auto download so that the client file is alot smaller.

create a cache and make it so it downloads and extracts the cache to your C:/

then jar you client and it will be 100x smaller then upload the client.jar to something like fileden or dropbox in PUBLIC and then put the link in the HTML code on the website :)]

hope this helped[/quote]
Ill try it and get back to you on that…

UPDATE: Now it is 3KB and runs ALOT faster thank you… Wouldn’t have thought about that…

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient Slow and Doesnt work?
item.dc:creator: @qtst35 qtst35
item.description:
@qtst35 wrote:

your supposed to have you cache auto download so that the client file is alot smaller.

create a cache and make it so it downloads and extracts the cache to your C:/

then jar you client and it will be 100x smaller then upload the client.jar to something like fileden or dropbox in PUBLIC and then put the link in the HTML code on the website :)]

hope this helped

Read full topic
